page.title: 16WORKING FARMS NEAR POYNTON 2
page.content: Noggin Farm dates back to 1347 and has been lived in by the White family for 300 years.Mr.White has worked on Noggin Farm for 42 years.The total area of the farm is 28acres.Mr.White owns 56 cows,all Freisans.On average each cow produces 5gallons of milk per day.In winter the cattle are fed on cattle corn,sugar beet and hay.In a good year between 20 & 24 calves are born.None of these are sold,the cattle are always sold at their lives end. Mr.White has 5 people working for him- 1 fulltime,1 part-time and 3 part-time on the milk rounds.The milk is bottled with a 4 valve bottling machine. Mr.White does not think there will be any major changes at Noggin Farm because it is small.
